title: Aloo Paratha
instructions: Prepare dough using wheat flour and water, knead and rest it.
Mix mashed potatoes with spices to make filling.
Roll dough into discs, stuff with filling, seal and flatten again.
Cook on tawa with ghee or oil till golden brown on both sides.

title: Methi Paratha
instructions: Mix all ingredients and knead into soft dough.
Roll into parathas and roast on tawa with ghee or oil until golden brown.

title: Paneer Paratha
instructions: Make soft dough with wheat flour and water.
Mix paneer with spices to prepare filling.
Roll, stuff, seal and flatten the dough, cook on tawa with ghee or oil.

title: Gobhi Paratha
instructions: Prepare dough with wheat flour and water.
Mix grated gobhi with spices.
Stuff the filling, roll into parathas and roast with ghee.

title: Chana Paratha
instructions: Make dough using flour and water.
Mix chana with spices and prepare filling.
Stuff and roll the parathas, roast until golden brown.

title: Vegetable Paratha
instructions: Knead dough using flour and water.
Mix mashed veggies with spices.
Stuff and roll parathas, roast on tawa until crisp.

title: Mixed Veg Chilla
instructions: Mix besan with water and spices to form a batter.
Add chopped vegetables.
Pour on tawa and cook on both sides till golden.

title: Moong Dal Chilla
instructions: Grind soaked moong dal with chili and ginger.
Add salt and coriander.
Pour batter on hot tawa, cook both sides till crisp.

title: Besan Chilla
instructions: Mix besan with spices and water to make batter.
Add coriander, pour batter on hot tawa.
Cook both sides till golden.

title: Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and set aside.
Sauté mustard seeds, onion, green chili and turmeric.
Add poha, salt and mix well.
Finish with lemon juice and coriander.

title: Vegetable Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and set aside.
Sauté mustard seeds, onion, green chili, and turmeric.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Add poha, salt, and mix well.
Finish with lemon juice and coriander.

title: Chivda Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and set aside.
Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, peanuts, and curry leaves.
Add turmeric and sugar.
Add poha and mix well. Cook for a few minutes.
Add salt and roasted chana.

title: Sabudana Khichdi
instructions: Soak sabudana for 4-5 hours.
Heat ghee, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and peanuts.
Add green chili and boiled potatoes.
Add soaked sabudana and cook until soft.
Finish with salt, lemon juice, and coriander.

title: Aloo Puri
instructions: Make dough using whole wheat flour and water.
Mix mashed potatoes with spices.
Stuff the filling into dough balls and roll into puris.
Deep fry until golden brown.

title: Chana Puri
instructions: Make dough using whole wheat flour and water.
Mash boiled chana and mix with spices.
Stuff chana filling into dough balls and roll into puris.
Deep fry until golden brown.

title: Poori Bhaji
instructions: Make dough for puris using wheat flour, water, and spices.
Deep fry the puris until golden brown.
For bhaji, sauté cumin seeds, onions, turmeric, chili powder, and cumin powder.
Add boiled mashed potatoes, salt, and water to make a curry-like consistency.

title: Stuffed Kulcha
instructions: Make dough using flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, and water.
Mix grated paneer, boiled potatoes, and spices to prepare the filling.
Stuff the dough with the filling, roll, and cook on tawa with ghee.

title: Palak Paratha
instructions: Knead dough using wheat flour and water.
Mix spinach with cumin powder and salt.
Stuff the dough with spinach mixture, roll into parathas, and cook on tawa.

title: Vegetable Sandwich
instructions: Spread butter on bread slices.
Layer with cucumber, tomato, onion, and lettuce.
Season with salt and pepper and assemble the sandwich.

title: Chutney Sandwich
instructions: Spread coriander and mint chutney on bread slices.
Add lettuce leaves and cucumber slices.
Assemble and serve.

title: Suji Toast
instructions: Mix suji, flour, baking powder, cumin, turmeric, and salt.
Add yogurt and water to form a smooth batter.
Heat oil in a pan, pour the batter, and cook on both sides until golden brown.

title: Bread Pakora
instructions: Mash boiled potatoes and mix with spices.
Stuff the bread slices with the potato mixture.
Dip stuffed bread slices in chickpea flour batter.
Deep fry until golden brown.

title: Chole Kulche
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin seeds, and sauté onion, chili, and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, garam masala, and chili powder.
Add boiled chickpeas, water, and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve with kulche and garnish with coriander.

title: Aloo Sandwich
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on bread slices.
Add mashed potatoes, cucumber, and tomato.
Season with salt and pepper and assemble the sandwich.

title: Stuffed Bread Roll
instructions: Mash boiled potatoes and mix with cheese and spices.
Stuff bread slices with the mixture and roll.
Toast the stuffed rolls in butter until golden brown.

title: Rajma Roll
instructions: Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add boiled rajma and cook for 5 minutes.
Place the rajma mixture in roti/paratha with lettuce and roll.

title: Paneer Bhurji Sandwich
instructions: Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add crumbled paneer and cook for 5 minutes.
Spread the mixture on bread slices and toast with butter.

title: Bhatura with Aloo
instructions: Make dough for bhatura with flour, yogurt, baking powder, and salt.
Roll the dough into rounds and deep fry until golden.
For aloo, mix mashed potatoes with spices.
Serve bhatura with aloo.

title: Tandoori Roti Wrap
instructions: Grill the paneer and prepare the roti.
Place grilled paneer, onions, tomatoes, and sauce on roti.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Kathi Roll (Veg)
instructions: Sauté mixed vegetables with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Place the mixture on roti and drizzle with yogurt sauce.
Roll up the roti and serve.

title: Matar Paratha
instructions: Mash boiled green peas and mix with chopped chili, ginger, cumin seeds, and salt.
Knead whole wheat flour with water to make a soft dough.
Divide dough into balls, stuff each with pea filling, and roll into parathas.
Roast on a hot griddle with ghee or oil until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

title: Roti with Mixed Veg
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, peas, capsicum)
instructions: Knead wheat flour with water to make soft roti dough.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, onion, and sauté.
Add tomato and spices, then mixed vegetables. Cook until soft.
Make rotis and cook them on a hot tawa.
Serve hot with mixed veg sabzi.

title: Stuffed Thepla
ingredients: 1/2 cup grated paneer or mashed potato
instructions: Prepare dough using wheat flour, yogurt, turmeric, and salt.
Mix the stuffing ingredients (paneer/potato, chili, ginger, cumin, salt).
Divide dough into balls, stuff with the mixture, and roll into theplas.
Cook on tawa with oil until golden brown.
Serve with pickle or curd.

title: Missi Roti
instructions: Mix wheat flour, besan, onion, chili, ajwain, and salt.
Add water gradually to form a soft dough.
Roll out rotis and cook on tawa with ghee until golden.
Serve hot with butter or curd.

title: Spinach Sandwich
instructions: Blanch spinach and mix with corn, cheese, salt, and pepper.
Spread mixture on bread slices, cover with another slice.
Butter the outside and grill until golden and crisp.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Mooli Paratha
instructions: Squeeze water from grated radish and mix with chili, ajwain, and salt.
Knead wheat flour into a soft dough.
Roll dough into balls, stuff with radish mixture, and flatten into parathas.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden brown.
Serve with curd or pickle.

title: Onion Paratha
instructions: Mix onion, chili, cumin, and salt into a stuffing.
Make dough using wheat flour and water.
Stuff dough balls with onion mixture and roll into parathas.
Cook on tawa with ghee until brown spots appear.
Serve hot with curd or chutney.

title: Tandoori Veg Wrap
instructions: Marinate vegetables in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes.
Grill or sauté until cooked and slightly charred.
Place mixture in wraps, add chutney if desired.
Roll tightly and serve warm.

title: Malai Paneer Roll
instructions: Marinate paneer in cream, garam masala, and salt for 20 minutes.
Sauté onion, capsicum, and marinated paneer in butter.
Place mixture in wraps and roll tightly.
Serve warm with chutney or sauce.

title: Vegetable Frankie
ingredients: 1 cup boiled mixed vegetables (potato, carrot, peas)
instructions: Mash vegetables with spices and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
Place filling in rotis, add onion and chutney.
Roll tightly and cook lightly on tawa if needed.
Serve hot.

title: Samosa Sandwich
instructions: Mash the samosas and spread chutney on the bread slices.
Layer with lettuce, cucumber, and tomato slices.
Place the mashed samosa mixture between the bread slices and serve.

title: Paneer Kathi Roll
instructions: Grill the paneer and prepare the roti.
Place grilled paneer, onions, tomatoes, and sauce on roti.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Lachha Paratha
instructions: Make a dough with flour, salt, baking powder, and water.
Roll out the dough into a thin disc.
Fold the disc into a coil and roll it out again.
Cook the paratha on a hot griddle, brushing with ghee on both sides.

title: Masala Bread
instructions: Toast bread slices in butter.
Prepare a masala mixture with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Top the toasted bread with the masala mixture and serve.

title: Corn Paratha
instructions: Mix the flours and spices with water to make a dough.
Roll out the dough into thin discs.
Cook the parathas on a griddle, brushing with ghee.

title: Aloo Roll
instructions: Mash the boiled potatoes and mix with spices.
Fill the roti with the potato mixture, onions, tomatoes, and coriander leaves.
Roll it up and serve with a squeeze of lemon juice.

title: Mix Veg Sandwich
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on the bread slices.
Layer with cucumber, tomato, carrot, and mashed potatoes.
Season with salt and pepper and assemble the sandwich.

title: Khakhra
instructions: Mix all ingredients and knead into a dough.
Roll out the dough into thin discs.
Cook the khakhra on a griddle until crispy.
Brush with ghee and serve.

title: Mathri with Pickle
instructions: Mix flour and spices and knead into a dough.
Roll out the dough and cut into small rounds.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with pickle.

title: Kachori with Aloo Sabzi
instructions: Make the dough with flour, spices, and water.
Prepare a filling with mashed potatoes, onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Stuff the dough with the filling and deep fry.
Serve with aloo sabzi.

title: Tandoori Veg Sandwich
instructions: Marinate paneer and vegetables in yogurt, tandoori masala, and salt for 15-20 minutes.
Grill or sauté the mixture until lightly charred.
Place filling between bread slices, butter the outside, and grill until golden.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Chana Bhatura
instructions: Pressure cook chickpeas until soft.
Sauté cumin, onion, ginger-garlic paste, tomato, and chana masala. Add chickpeas and simmer.
Knead flour, yogurt, and salt into a dough. Rest for 1 hour.
Roll and deep-fry bhaturas until puffed.
Serve hot with chana and salad.

title: Bajra Roti with Bharta
instructions: Knead bajra flour with hot water into a dough. Roll and cook on tawa.
Roast eggplant over flame, peel, and mash.
Mix mashed eggplant with onion, tomato, chili, salt, and mustard oil.
Serve bajra roti with baingan bharta.

title: Dal Paratha
instructions: Mix cooked dal with spices and chili.
Knead flour into soft dough and stuff with dal filling.
Roll and roast on tawa with ghee until golden.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

title: Bathua Paratha
instructions: Blanch and mash bathua leaves.
Mix with flour, spices, and water to make dough.
Roll into parathas and roast with ghee.
Serve with butter or curd.

title: Bhindi Roti
instructions: Mix bhindi, chili, turmeric, and salt into flour.
Add water and knead into a dough.
Roll into rotis and cook on tawa with oil.
Serve with pickle or raita.

title: Cabbage Paratha
instructions: Mix grated cabbage with spices and salt.
Knead with flour to form soft dough.
Roll into parathas and roast with oil/ghee.
Serve with chutney or curd.

title: Chana Masala Sandwich
instructions: Mash chickpeas and mix with onion, tomato, salt, and chaat masala.
Spread mixture on bread slices and cover with another slice.
Butter outer sides and toast until golden.
Serve hot with chutney.

title: Fried Roti Roll
instructions: Place filling in rotis and roll tightly.
Shallow fry until crispy and golden on all sides.
Sprinkle chaat masala and serve with dip.

title: Gajar Paratha
instructions: Mix grated carrot, chili, cumin, and salt into the flour.
Knead into soft dough and roll into parathas.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden.
Serve with curd or butter.

title: Egg Paratha
instructions: Knead the flour into a soft dough using water and salt.
Roll the dough into a ball and flatten it into a circle.
Heat a tawa and cook the paratha until light golden brown on both sides.
In a separate pan, scramble an egg with oil and season with salt and cumin powder.
Place the scrambled egg on the paratha and roll it up.
Serve hot.

title: Anda Bhurji
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.
Add green chilies, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and garam masala.
Crack the eggs into the pan and scramble them.
Cook until the eggs are fully scrambled and cooked.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Egg Roll
instructions: Cook the egg as a scrambled egg in a pan.
Heat the paratha and place it on a flat surface.
Add the scrambled egg, onions, tomatoes, cucumber, and chili sauce on the paratha.
Roll the paratha tightly and serve.

title: Anda Chilla
instructions: Whisk the eggs and chickpea flour together.
Add chopped onions, tomatoes, green chili, cumin powder, and salt.
Heat a pan with oil and pour the mixture onto it.
Cook until both sides are golden brown.
Serve with chutney.

title: Egg Curry Sandwich
instructions: Mash the boiled eggs and mix with onions, tomatoes, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Spread the egg mixture on one slice of bread and top with the other.
Grill the sandwich with butter until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.

title: Boiled Egg Poha
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add turmeric powder and salt.
Add the poha and mix well.
Top with boiled eggs and garnish with coriander leaves.
Serve hot.

title: Scrambled Egg with Paratha
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a pan with salt.
Heat the paratha and serve with scrambled eggs.

title: Egg Frankie
instructions: Scramble the egg in a pan with salt.
Heat the paratha and place the scrambled egg, onions, cucumber, and chili sauce on top.
Roll the paratha tightly and serve.

title: Egg Bhurji Wrap
instructions: Scramble the eggs with onions, tomatoes, cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Place the scrambled egg mixture on a wrap or paratha.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Masala Egg Roll
instructions: Scramble the eggs and season with salt and chili sauce.
Place the scrambled eggs, onions, and tomatoes on the paratha.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Omelette Sandwich
instructions: Beat eggs with onion, chili, salt, and pepper.
Cook the omelette on a pan.
Place omelette between bread slices and toast with butter.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Egg Bhurji with Pav
instructions: Sauté onion, tomato, and green chili in butter.
Add spices and beaten eggs. Scramble until cooked.
Toast pav buns with butter.
Serve egg bhurji with pav.

title: Anda Curry with Bread
instructions: Sauté onion, ginger-garlic paste, and tomato until soft.
Add spices and cook the masala.
Add water to make gravy, then add boiled eggs.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve hot with bread.

title: Egg Kulcha
instructions: Prepare a spiced omelette with onion, chili, and eggs.
Warm kulchas with butter.
Place egg omelette between kulchas like a sandwich.
Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

title: Egg Masala Roll
instructions: Cook an omelette and place it on a cooked paratha.
Add onions, chutney, chaat masala, and roll it.
Toast lightly with butter and serve hot.

title: Egg Puri
instructions: Make dough using flour, water, and salt.
Roll out small puris and deep-fry till puffed.
Slice boiled eggs and sprinkle with chili powder and salt.
Serve hot puris with spiced eggs.

title: Bread Egg Pakora
instructions: Cut bread and boiled eggs into halves.
Make a thick batter of besan and spices.
Dip bread-egg combo into batter and deep-fry till golden.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Anda Parantha Wrap
instructions: Pour beaten egg on a hot tawa, place parantha on it to coat.
Flip and cook both sides till egg is done.
Add onions, chutney, and roll the wrap.
Serve hot with sauce.

title: Egg Cutlet
instructions: Mash eggs and potato, add spices and mix well.
Shape into cutlets and coat with bread crumbs.
Shallow fry till golden brown.
Serve with chutney or ketchup.

title: Egg Bread Roll
instructions: Beat eggs with onion, pepper, and salt.
Dip bread slices in the egg mix and roll tightly.
Toast rolls on pan with butter until golden brown.
Serve warm.

title: Chicken Paratha
instructions: Knead the flour into a soft dough using water and salt.
Prepare a filling by mixing the shredded chicken, onions, cumin powder, and salt.
Roll the dough into small balls and flatten them.
Place the chicken filling in the center and seal the dough.
Cook the stuffed paratha on a tawa with oil until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Bhurji
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until they become soft.
Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add minced chicken and cook until it is fully cooked.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Keema Pav
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add minced meat and cook until browned and cooked through.
Toast the pav and serve the keema mixture in the pav.

title: Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread.
Layer with shredded chicken, onions, tomatoes, and lettuce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Top with the other slice of bread and serve.

title: Mutton Kheema Roll
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add minced mutton and cook until browned and cooked through.
Place the kheema on the paratha or wrap and roll it up.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Kathi Roll
instructions: Season the cooked chicken with cumin powder, red chili powder, and salt.
Place the chicken on a wrap or paratha along with onions, lettuce, and chili sauce.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Chicken Egg Roll
instructions: Scramble the egg in a pan and cook until done.
Place the scrambled egg and shredded chicken on the wrap or paratha.
Top with onions and chili sauce.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Chicken Frankie
instructions: Season the chicken with cumin powder, salt, and chili sauce.
Place the chicken on the wrap or paratha with sliced onions.
Roll it up and serve.

title: Chicken Bhurji Roll
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add minced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Place the chicken bhurji mixture on the wrap or paratha and roll it up.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Curry with Paratha
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned and fully cooked.
Serve the curry with a hot paratha.

title: Tandoori Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Mix tandoori chicken with mayonnaise.
Place lettuce, onion, and chicken mix between bread slices.
Toast the sandwich with butter until golden.
Serve hot with ketchup or chutney.

title: Mutton Sandwich
instructions: Spread chutney on bread slices.
Add a layer of mutton keema and onions.
Cover with another slice and toast with butter.
Serve hot with mint chutney.

title: Chicken Keema Parantha
instructions: Prepare dough with flour and water.
Mix chicken keema with onion, chili, and spices.
Stuff dough with filling and roll into paratha.
Cook on tawa with oil/ghee until golden.
Serve hot with curd or pickle.

title: Chicken Kulcha Roll
instructions: Warm kulchas with butter.
Spread mint chutney, add chicken and onion slices.
Roll tightly and toast briefly on tawa.
Serve hot with dip or chutney.

title: Chicken Tikka Sandwich
instructions: Mix chicken tikka with curd/mayo.
Layer lettuce, onion, and chicken on bread.
Grill or toast the sandwich with butter.
Serve hot with dip or salad.

title: Chicken Poha
instructions: Rinse poha and drain well.
Sauté onion and chili, add turmeric and chicken.
Mix in poha and cook until heated through.
Garnish with lemon juice and coriander.

title: Chicken Cutlet
instructions: Mix chicken, mashed potato, spices, and form cutlets.
Coat in bread crumbs.
Shallow fry until golden brown.
Serve with ketchup or chutney.

title: Butter Chicken Roll
instructions: Warm parathas and spread chutney.
Add butter chicken and onion slices.
Roll tightly and toast lightly on tawa.
Serve hot.

title: Spicy Chicken Wrap
instructions: Warm the wrap and spread spicy sauce.
Add chicken, lettuce, and onion.
Roll it up and toast lightly.
Serve with dip.

title: Chicken Bread Pakora
instructions: Make a thick besan batter with spices.
Sandwich chicken keema between two bread slices.
Dip in batter and deep fry until golden.
Serve hot with chutney.
